long_description: Easy to carry and to stow, the REI Lunch Ice Box is roomy enough for your midday meal and tall enough to fit a 12-oz. can of your favorite beverage. Webbing handle and detachable shoulder strap provide carrying options. Closed-cell foam provides efficient insulation to keep food and beverages cool for hours. The REI Lunch Ice Box has an outer zip pocket for utensils and napkins. Heavy-duty PEVA liner is waterproof, PVC-free and easy to wipe clean.
short_description: Easy to carry and to stow, the REI Lunch Ice Box is roomy enough for your midday meal and tall enough to fit a 12-oz. can of your favorite beverage.
